name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solution Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing **DevOps** practices and building **Microservices** architectures that drive high-performance solutions. Proficient in **React** and leveraging tools like **vite** and **module federation**, I ensure modularity and scalability in development. My dedication to **Test Driven Development** and expertise in **CI/CD** processes, especially with **GitLab CI**, enable rapid delivery of robust applications.

Incorporating **MLOps**, I have successfully developed and deployed machine learning models with the support of **AI** technologies, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My experience extends into cloud environments with Amazon and other platforms, alongside familiarity with **GitHub Copilot** to enhance productivity.

Moreover, I harness monitoring and observability tools such as **Prometheus**, **Kibana**, and **Grafana** for performance optimization. Coupled with knowledge in **Spring**, **Domain Driven Design**, and container orchestration with **OpenShift**, I am committed to delivering secure applications aligned with industry compliance standards. My technical prowess is further complemented by my strengths in leading the development of impactful enterprise-grade platforms, ensuring that solutions meet client needs in dynamic sectors like healthcare and finance.
